summary: A command‑line script that loads an Animatediff motion module from a safetensors checkpoint, converts it into a Diffusers MotionAdapter model, and writes the converted weights for use with the Diffusers library.
business_intent: Facilitate migration of Animatediff motion modules to the Diffusers ecosystem, allowing developers to integrate existing motion adapters into Diffusers pipelines without manual re‑implementation.
